content.text: Match ends, Granada CF 0, Almería 2.
Second Half ends, Granada CF 0, Almería 2.
Offside, Granada CF. Odion Ighalo tries a through ball, but Diego Buonanotte is caught offside.
Corner,  Granada CF. Conceded by Sebastián Dubarbier.
Attempt blocked. Yacine Brahimi (Granada CF) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Fran Rico.

Corner,  Granada CF. Conceded by Ángel Trujillo.

Goal!  Granada CF 0, Almería 2. Aleix Vidal (Almería) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom left corner.
